subject: contrôle box
description_text:
Hi, since i received the pedals control box the simmson manager is
freezing regularly with this message

SIMMSON FLASHER, THE CONTROL BOX IS IN UPDATE MODE PLEASE VERIFY IF THE
UPDATE BUTTON IS FREE AND UNPLUG THEN PLUG THE USB TO GET OUT OF THAT MODE

Did that many times and not working anymore, also the controle bol is
sparkling when a plug it

Please help

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8767 中
